com.chipsandwaycool.entity.player

类 Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chipsandwaycool.entity.player.Player
  • 直接已知子类:
    PlayerWithScores

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents a user of this site, a player in the March Madness pool (not a player in the actual NCAA tournament). It encapsulates the user's login information as well as some personal information, and whether the user has administrative priveleges.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Player()
      Instantiate a new Player without initializing it to meaningful values.
      Player(java.lang.String username, boolean active, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String email, boolean admin)
      Create a new Player with the given attributes.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean getActive()
      Return whether this player is active or enabled.
      boolean getAdmin()
      Return my administrator flag.
      java.lang.String getCompleteName()
      Return a full name for this player, including both first and last name and the nickname, if one is defined.
      java.lang.String getEmail()
      Return this player's email address.
      java.lang.String getFirstName()
      Return my first name.
      boolean getHasPickedTeam(int teamID)
      Return whether the specified team is among my picks.
      int getID()
      Return my unique ID.
      java.lang.String getLastName()
      Return my last name.
      java.lang.String getNickname()
      Return this player's nickname.
      java.lang.String getNicknameOrFirstName()
      Return my nickname if I have one, else return my first name.
      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Return my password.
      int getPick(int index)
      Return the team ID for the zero-based pick index (where index 0 is worth 1 point and index 19 is worth 20).
      int getPointsForTeam(int teamID)
      Return the points value this player has associated with the specified team ID, or return 0 if that team is not among my picks.
      java.lang.String getShortName()
      Return a partial name for this player, including the nickname and last name, or the first and the nickname, if no nickname is defined.
      java.lang.String getUsername()
      Return my username.

      Set whether this player is active or enabled.

      Set my administrator flag.

      Set the email address for this player.

      Set this player's first name.

      Set my unique ID.
      void setLastName(java.lang.String lastName)
      Set my last name.

      Set a nickname for this player.
      void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
      Set my password.
      void setPicks(int[] picks)
      Set the list of team picks for this player, in order of points.

      Set my username.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Player

        public Player()
        Instantiate a new Player without initializing it to meaningful values.

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String username,
              boolean active,
              java.lang.String password,
              java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String lastName,
              java.lang.String nickname,
              java.lang.String email,
              boolean admin)
        Create a new Player with the given attributes.
        参数:
        active - whether the player is active or enabled
        username - this player's login name
        password - my password
        firstName - my first name
        lastName - my last name
        nickname - a nickname for this player
        email - the player's email address
        admin - whether this player acts as an admin on the site

      • getPick

        public int getPick(int index)
        Return the team ID for the zero-based pick index (where index 0 is worth 1 point and index 19 is worth 20). If no team is picked yet for the given index, return -1.
        参数:
        index - the zero-based index of the desired team pick
        返回:
        the team ID for the given pick index

      • getPointsForTeam

        public int getPointsForTeam(int teamID)
        Return the points value this player has associated with the specified team ID, or return 0 if that team is not among my picks.
        参数:
        teamID - the ID of the team in question
        返回:
        the point value associated, or zero

      • getHasPickedTeam

        public boolean getHasPickedTeam(int teamID)
        Return whether the specified team is among my picks.
        参数:
        teamID - the ID of the team in question
        返回:
        whether I have picked that team to win
